original_table_html:
| Question | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| 11-18    | Relative to customer value, explain customers’ willingness to pay premium prices for Lululemon’s products. |
| 11-19    | Based on principles from the chapter, explain how price affects customer perceptions of the Lululemon brand. |
| 11-20    | Could Lululemon have achieved the same level of success had it executed an alternative pricing strategy? |
| 11-21    | Can Lululemon continue to succeed by employing the same premium-pricing strategy? Explain. |
summary_markdown: This table presents a series of questions related to Lululemon's pricing strategy and its impact on customer perception and brand success. The questions explore the relationship between customer value and Lululemon's ability to command premium prices, examining how pricing influences customer perceptions of the brand. Furthermore, the questions delve into the potential for alternative pricing strategies to achieve similar success and assess the long-term viability of Lululemon's current premium-pricing approach. The overarching structure is analytical and evaluative, prompting a critical examination of Lululemon's pricing decisions and their consequences.
